item.description:
I am really hesitant about proposing this game night as it probably outs me as a bonafide nerd now.  ;-)  A miniatures game?  And a licensed Star Wars game?!  Well, what can I say... this is one of the funnest tabletop experiences I have had in a long time and I would love to share this game with anyone who is interested.

Star Wars X-Wing is a quick team-based battle game.  Move stuff around on the table, roll some dice and try to blow stuff up.  Relieve the stresses of the work week tonight and get ready for the weekend.

Food:

Drinks will be provided.  Please consider bringing a lite refreshment to share, and/or eating dinner prior to joining us.

---

About the location:

This event will be hosted at a private residence, conveniently located at the intersections of Route 1 and Route 95.  If you need directions, just ask.  This is a housing complex, so please do NOT park in any numbered spaces.  There are no animals on the premises and the property should be child-friendly.  Look for Unit 901 since Meetup doesn't display addresses correctly! :-(

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Mini-Meetup: Star Wars X-Wing
